MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Dundas Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.26am.  Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Perth Street substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:29pm on 9th November 2020.
